entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:24 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 8.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 09:16 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 8.0°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 100 %

Wind: W 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
